pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saṃgho sannipatito hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.3: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cīvarakammaṃ karontā ekassa chandaṃ adaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.4: Atha kho saṃgho “yassatthāya sannipatito taṃ kammaṃ karissāmī”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.6: “evamevime ekamekassa kammaṃ karonti, kassa tumhe kammaṃ karissathā”ti chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.9: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.10: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.13: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.14: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.7: vatthu vā ārocitaṃ hoti avinicchitaṃ, ñatti vā ṭhapitā hoti, kammavācā vā vippakatā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.9: “kathaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ kuppaṃ assa vaggaṃ assa na kareyyā”ti gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.12: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.13: Dhammakamme vematiko chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.2.1: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, anāpatti.
